trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流程執行個體暫止原因的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs 是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構的工作流程執行個體被擱置時產生。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, then the workflow tracking infrastructure puts a TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the Tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>相關聯的執行個體包含與工作流程<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>，則工作流程追蹤基礎結構會置於 TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>中<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>針對它傳送至追蹤服務。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs 僅供執行階段追蹤服務資訊傳入<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流程執行個體暫止原因的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can come from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend*> (string error) or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error*> property that you set on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是來自<> *> （字串錯誤） 或<> *> 屬性與您在設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity"></xref>活動。

trans-unit.source: String value that contains the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流程執行個體暫止原因的字串值。
